languages.text: {n}Расклад у вас — ни туда, ни сюда. С такими раскладами играют только отчаявшиеся, которым больше нечего ставить.{/n}
{n}Your hand is not especially good or bad. It is the kind of hand played only by someone desperate who has nothing left to bet.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Расклад у вас — ни туда, ни сюда. С такими раскладами играют только отчаявшиеся, которым больше нечего ставить.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Your hand is not especially good or bad. It is the kind of hand played only by someone desperate who has nothing left to bet.{/n}

{n}Your hand is not especially good or bad. It is the kind of hand played only by someone desperate who has nothing left to bet.{/n}

languages.text: {n}你的牌不算特别好，也不算特别烂。恐怕只有走投无路、输光了钱的人，才会把赌注押在这种牌上。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Your hand is not especially good or bad. It is the kind of hand played only by someone desperate who has nothing left to bet.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}你的牌不算特别好，也不算特别烂。恐怕只有走投无路、输光了钱的人，才会把赌注押在这种牌上。{/n}

languages.text: {n}あなたの手札は特に良くも悪くもない。これを見せるのは、賭けるものが何も残っていない絶望的な人だけだろう。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Your hand is not especially good or bad. It is the kind of hand played only by someone desperate who has nothing left to bet.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}あなたの手札は特に良くも悪くもない。これを見せるのは、賭けるものが何も残っていない絶望的な人だけだろう。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Tu mano no es ni buena ni mala. Es la clase de mano que solo jugaría alguien desesperado a quien no le queda nada que apostar.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Your hand is not especially good or bad. It is the kind of hand played only by someone desperate who has nothing left to bet.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Tu mano no es ni buena ni mala. Es la clase de mano que solo jugaría alguien desesperado a quien no le queda nada que apostar.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Votre main n'est ni bonne ni mauvaise. C'est simplement le genre de main que l'on joue quand on n'a plus rien d'important à parier.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Votre main n'est ni bonne ni mauvaise. C'est simplement le genre de main que l'on joue quand on n'a plus rien d'important à parier.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Dein Hand ist weder besonders gut noch besonders schlecht. Mit dieser Hand würde man nur spielen, wenn man völlig verzweifelt wäre und nichts mehr zu verlieren hätte.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Elin, özellikle iyi veya kötü değil. Yalnızca bahse koyacak bir şeyi kalmayan, umutsuz bir oyuncunun oynayacağı türde bir el.{/n}
